article_title: The Politics Of Why Medicare Advantage Is Capturing Seniors

article_metadata.description: Washington’s benign neglect of Medicare’s traditional fee for service program is perhaps the best sales tool for Medicare Advantage plans. Fee for service Medicare is hobbled by a long history of failed payment reforms, increasing regulation, and declining reimbursement levels. These woes reduce the number of new Medicare patients that providers [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
